Job Title: DevOps Engineer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
The roleAs a DevOps Engineer at Hum Capital, you’ll build the foundation upon which all of our technology runs. You’ll help architect our system for cloud-native environments while building tools to help our development teams ensure our features are highly reliable. Your role is pivotal—developing tools for system health monitoring, automation, and preemptive issue resolution to maintain high reliability and performance. Your contributions will be key in keeping Hum at the forefront of data-driven solutions, leveraging technology to power our growth and innovation.
Who we areHum Capital is the funding platform that connects great companies with the right capital. Our platform leverages the power of company data to streamline the fundraising process, offering personalized investment opportunities and insights. With over $650 million in committed capital raised for our partners across 2,000+ companies and 400+ institutional investors, Hum is making private fundraising efficient and accessible.Hum was founded by alumni from Stanford, Draper Fisher Jurvetson (DFJ), OakTree, Foursquare, NASA, Class Dojo, and has over 75 years of experience on Wall Street and Silicon Valley. For more information, visit humcapital.com.
What you'll be doing:Reducing toil and providing self-service & automated solutions for application teams.Designing reliable infrastructure for our platform and services.Finding ways to support dev teams by providing tools for observability.Reviewing technical proposals and participating in core systems designs (primarily written in python and rust).Provide support on outages and monitor applications as we run and take care of them.
What you’ll bring5+ years of experience designing, implementing, and maintaining production-grade infrastructure.Background as a Software Engineer with strong CS fundamentals. Experience with Python and Rust preferred.Ability to troubleshoot applications and provide advice to developers.Strong experience with CI/CD Pipelines.Knowledge of data-oriented applications and tools.Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, AWS or other cloud providers.Knowledge of infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform, Pulumi, and Cloudformation and their trade-offs.
Preferred Experience and SkillsPreferred experience with SOC2, CCPA, GDPR, and/or PCI-compliant systems.A collaborative attitude, clear communication, exceptional time management, and organization skills, all of which enhance teamwork and project success.ContainersInfrastructure as code (Pulumi, Terraform, Ansible, Salt, Puppet)Hashicorp StackCloud native applicationsCloud providersProvisioning ToolsPythonRustInfrastructure EngineerSRESoftware DevelopmentDistributed Systems
Annual Salary The expected salary range for this position is $175K - $200K.
Our cultureRemote-first company: We appreciate our awesome team and value open communication! We kindly ask all staff to be available through phone, email, or our designated messaging platform during the agreed-upon work schedule. This might mean aligning your working hours with your supervisor, regardless of your location or time zone. High Context Start-up: We operate as a high-context startup, where our foundation rests on the profound significance of shared understanding and direct communication. In our dynamic environment, we prioritize ownership, encouraging each team member to take responsibility and contribute to our shared success. Effective collaboration hinges on a deep sense of trust within our team.
Perks/benefitsFully funded medical coverageFlexible PTO policyHybrid work environmentHum offers a flexible work policy that allows for remote or in-person environmentsLaptopPaid parental leave
How we are differentAt Hum, we are a team of passionate people that hire under equal opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, disability, gender identity, or any other status protected under federal, state, or local law. We love to boost a transparent and trustful culture of belonging and inclusiveness. All people have the opportunity to speak up and participate, grow, and share ideas. If you believe you would add value to our team but you don’t meet all the criteria in this job description, we strongly encourage you to still apply and tell us what value that would be.

Experience Level (if available): None
